items.sentence: Tom came into the room, followed by John and Mary.
Tom came out of the bathroom with only a towel on.
Tom can get to work faster on bicycle than by car.
Do you suppose that we\'re actually in any danger?
Tom might be able to tell us what we want to know.
Tom often brings Mary with him when he comes here.
Tom never would\'ve left without telling me first.
Could you please tell me again who your father is?
I caught Tom stealing some money out of my wallet.
I could be using this time to do something useful.
